pages.text: And I do not acquit myself, indeed the soul orders to the badness except if my Master has mercy, indeed my Master is forgiving and merciful
And the king said: bring him to me, I select him (to work) only for myself. So when he spoke to him, he said: as of today, you are respected and trustworthy with us
He said: put me in charge of treasures of the land, I am a knowledgeable guardian
And that is how We established Joseph in the land, to settle anywhere he wants in it. We give Our mercy to anyone We want, and We do not waste the reward of the good doers
And the reward of the hereafter is certainly better for those who believed and used to control themselves
And brothers of Joseph came and entered upon him (in the time of famine). So he recognized them while they did not recognize him
And when he provided them with their provision, he said: bring me a brother you have from your father (your stepbrother), do you not see that I give full measure and I am the best host
But if you do not bring him to me, then there is no measure (of grain) for you from me, and do not come near me
They said: we are going to try to get him from his father, and we are certainly doers
And he said to his servants: put their merchandise (and fund) in their saddlebags, so that they may recognize it when they go back to their family, so that they may return
So when they returned to their father, they said: our father, the measure was forbidden to us, so send our brother with us that we get measure, and we are certainly his guardians
